sentences.en: After getting married, he turns to be henpecked.
sentences.cn: 结婚后他完全变成了“气管炎”.

sentences.en: He is a typical henpecked husband.
Mr. Wrong a short novel written by Yi Shu, describes the lives of henpecked men.
sentences.cn: 亦舒的短篇小说《错先生》描述了“妻管严”男士的生活.

sentences.en: Shanghai men are jokingly called henpecked husbands.
sentences.cn: 上海男人常被戏谑为“妻管严”.

trans.tran_en: a man who is henpecked is always being told what to do by his wife, and is afraid to disagree with her

trans.tran_cn: 惧内( henpeck的过去式和过去分词 )
